channel.title: Need a bit of help with my new computer
channel.description:
Okay, I got a new laptop resently. It's a toshiba. I downloaded my friends server and clicked play.bat. When I click it, it says [code]c:\windows\system32\javaw.exe is not a valid Win23 application[/code]
The code for play.bat is: [code]@echo off Title Heaven-Pkz Client cd Files echo Welcome to Heaven-Pkz! echo Please visit the forums at www.heaven-pkz.tk echo The client will pop up in a moment, you may close this. Start JAVAW -Xmx400m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 lowmem members 32 pause [/code] ________________________________________________________________________ I HAVE downloaded jdk 6.14, and it doesnt work. When i save it to the defaut it says, [code]Cannot create a file in the directory[/code]
I've saved it in like 12 diferent spots and it STILL doesn't work.

item.title: Need a bit of help with my new computer
item.dc:creator: @pleya2 pleya2
item.description:
@pleya2 wrote:

Go to http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp

and download JDK 6 update 14

Read full topic
item.source: Need a bit of help with my new computer

So wait. How do i instal it without java sun?

item.title: Need a bit of help with my new computer
item.dc:creator: @Rufio Rufio
item.description:
@Rufio wrote:

Im pretty sure its the latest jdk.
Its anoying installing it.
i suggest installing it without using the java sun manager(it makes it take longer and more confusing)

Read full topic

item.description:

Failed to create file indestination...

Any thing im doing wrong?

item.title: Need a bit of help with my new computer
item.dc:creator: @time_of_rune time of rune
item.description:
@time_of_rune wrote:

Okay, I got a new laptop resently. It’s a toshiba. I downloaded my friends server and clicked play.bat. When I click it, it says

c:\windows\system32\javaw.exe is not a valid Win23 application

The code for play.bat is:

@echo off Title Heaven-Pkz Client cd Files echo Welcome to Heaven-Pkz! echo Please visit the forums at www.heaven-pkz.tk echo The client will pop up in a moment, you may close this. Start JAVAW -Xmx400m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 lowmem members 32 pause

I HAVE downloaded jdk 6.14, and it doesnt work. When i save it to the defaut it says,

Cannot create a file in the directory

I’ve saved it in like 12 diferent spots and it STILL doesn’t work.

Read full topic
